title: A Pride of islands
brief_description: Visiting the island of the Hebrides showing how they fish, farm and weave to make a living. The only airport in the world to the covered by water twice a day. The old battlements, castles and monuments 3000 years old. Safe haven from the sea for sailors of all nations.
